root.name: Premier Manager 2000
root.description: Premier Manager 2000 is the 8th game in the long running Premier Manager franchise. The game lets you take control of one of your favourite Premiership sides and guide them through the 1999/2000 season and beyond. The player must not only manage the team by changing tactics and tweaking training schedules, as manager you take control of the finances of your team. This means doing things like apllying for loans, increasing or decreasing entry fees to games, scheduling stadium improvements, choosing sponsors and advertising, managing player and staff wages and buying/selling players on the transfer market. Premier Manager 2000 allows two ways of experiencing matches. The first is simple text updates which scroll up the screen, commenting on big match occurences like a goal being scored or player getting injured. The second way lets the player to watch the match in full 3d, allowing them to control the camera, fast foward/rewind time or skip to important match moments.
